name: Arm's Race
description:
Year 1975. As a drone operator you need to find out what caused an evacuation of a soviet moon base.

Arm's race is a short, physics based, platformer made for "2 Buttons Game Jam".

Controls:

[c]- Rotate an arm clockwise 

[x]- Jump in a direction of the arm

[x]+[c]while in the air- Shoot a grapling hook

[x]while on a hook- Release the hook
